properties.body:
MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
STRAIT OF SICILY.
SARDINIA TO MALTA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
35 FOOT VESSEL MSY GULLSWAY, TWO PERSONS ON BOARD,
OVERDUE PORTO DI TEULADA (38-55-40N 008-43-35E)
TO VALLETTA (35-53-52N 014-30-45E). VESSELS
IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, 3906 5908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
